Html:
Hey rivantsov,

I was checking the change sets 24566, 24571 and 24572 to test out the NLALR parser on my project but I got weird errors in the first parser state. If you take your test grammers (NonCanonTestGrammars) you will see what I mean. After this I tried change set 24418 and everything worked as expected.. Did you somehow break the code for NLALR in the last three change sets?

thanks for reporting this, will fix it asap
Roman
